doc:
Irène Jacob https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ir%C3%A8ne_Jacob 0 Irène Marie Jacob (born 15 July 1966) is a French-Swiss actress known for her work with Polish film director Krzysztof Kieślowski. She won the 1991 Cannes Film Festival Award for Best Actress for the Kieślowski film The Double Life of Véronique, and was nominated for the BAFTA Award for Best Actress in a Leading Role for his 1994 film Three Colors: Red. Her other film appearances include The Secret Garden (1993), Beyond the Clouds (1995), U.S. Marshals (1998), and Eternity (2016). Irène_Marie_Jacob ( born 15_July_1966 ) is a_French-Swiss_actress known for her_work with Polish_film_director_Krzysztof_Kieślowski . She won the_1991_Cannes_Film_Festival_Award for_Best_Actress for the_Kieślowski_film The_Double_Life of Véronique , and was_nominated for the_BAFTA_Award for_Best_Actress in a_Leading_Role for his_1994_film_Three_Colors_:_Red . Her_other_film_appearances include The_Secret_Garden_(_1993_) , Beyond the_Clouds_(_1995_) , U.S._Marshals_(_1998_) , and Eternity_(_2016_) .
